plot outline: David Stephen Paul, a National Level Skating coach from Goa, is deeply in love with Kannada girl, Ashriya. When he approaches her with a marriage proposal, she first asks him to win a Championship for Karnataka as she is a Kannadiga at hear and maybe then she would consider his proposal. Therefore he takes it upon himself to fight the dirty politics surrounding the skating association.
title: Rankal Raate
plot: David Stephen Paul, a National Level Skating coach from Goa, is deeply in love with Kannada girl, Ashriya. When he approaches her with a marriage proposal, she first asks him to win a Championship for Karnataka as she is a Kannadiga at hear and maybe then she would consider his proposal. Therefore he takes it upon himself to fight the dirty politics surrounding the skating association.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
